page.title: 17Brownies and Cubs in Barnby
page.content: My name is Thea Pitchers.I am eight years old and I go to Brownies. We are all from seven to ten years old and we are going to Guides when we are older. We all make a special Brownie promise. This is the promise."I promise that I will do my best to do my duty to God, to serve the Queen and to help other people and to keep the Brownie Guide Law." Then we all have a game of skittles. The work we do is this. We work for badges and we collect for the R.S.P.C.A. My name is Matthew Caton and I go to Cubs. We go to Cubs at half past six. We go to learn things like how to get badges and how to light fires. We learn how to cook on camp fires and how to pitch tents.We have our meetings in a small hall with four rooms.
